title: Downloading problems
body: I was downloading League and it wouldn't fully download. Then I went to the boards to find my solution then got the link to fix the patch then it still wouldn't download. So I don't know what to do and I need help... It also keeps saying update failed at like 33%

replies.body:
Failures at 33% during patching are most often caused by a poor connection to the patching servers. This is because, at 33%, the patcher begins grabbing files from the patching servers. Most of the time, these issues are the result of network configurations that don't play well with League, so I recommend starting the troubleshooting process by working through our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this helped.
